类 PropertyMap

构造函数详细信息

PropertyMap

public PropertyMap()
Creates an empty property list with no default values.

PropertyMap

public PropertyMap(PropertyMap defaults)
Creates an empty property map with the specified defaults.

参数：
defaults - the defaults.
方法详细信息

get

public java.lang.String get(java.lang.String key)
Searches for the property with the specified key in this property list. If the key is not found in this property list, the default property list, and its defaults, recursively, are then checked. The method returns null if the property is not found.

参数：
key - the lookup key.
返回：
the value in this property list with the specified key value.
另请参见：
java.lang.Properties#setProperty, defaults

get

public java.lang.String get(java.lang.String key,
                            java.lang.String defaultValue)
Searches for the property with the specified key in this property list. If the key is not found in this property list, the default property list, and its defaults, recursively, are then checked. The method returns the default value argument if the property is not found.

参数：
key - the lookup key.
defaultValue - a default value.
返回：
the value in this property list with the specified key value.
另请参见：
java.lang.Properties#setProperty, defaults

setProperty

@Deprecated
public java.lang.String setProperty(java.lang.String key,
                                               java.lang.String value)
已过时。 use #put(String,String) instead

Merely a call to #put(String,String), provided as a simple way to migrate from java.lang.Properties.

参数：
key - the key to be placed into this property list.
value - the value corresponding to key.
返回：
the previous value of the specified key in this property list, or null if it did not have one.

getProperty

@Deprecated
public java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key)
已过时。 use @get(String) instead

Merely a call to get(String), provided as a simple way to migrate from java.lang.Properties.

参数：
key - the lookup key
返回：
the value in this property list with the specified key value.

getProperty

@Deprecated
public java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key,
                                               java.lang.String defaultValue)
已过时。 use get(String, String) instead

Merely a call to get(String, String), provided as a simple way to migrate from java.lang.Properties.

参数：
key - the lookup key.
defaultValue - a default value.
返回：
the value in this property list with the specified key value.

load

public void load(java.io.InputStream inStream)
          throws java.io.IOException
Reads a property list (key and element pairs) from the input byte stream. The input stream is in a simple line-oriented format as specified in load(InputStream) and is assumed to use the ISO 8859-1 character encoding; that is each byte is one Latin1 character. Characters not in Latin1, and certain special characters, are represented in keys and elements using Unicode escapes.

The specified stream remains open after this method returns.

参数：
inStream - the input stream.
抛出：
java.io.IOException - if an error occurred when reading from the input stream.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input stream contains a malformed Unicode escape sequence.
自从：
1.2

store

public void store(java.io.OutputStream out,
                  java.lang.String comments)
           throws java.io.IOException
Writes this property list (key and element pairs) in this PropertyMap table to the output stream in a format suitable for loading into a PropertyMap table using the load(InputStream) method.

Properties from the defaults table of this PropertyMap table (if any) are not written out by this method.

This method outputs the comments, properties keys and values in the same format as specified in store(Writer),

After the entries have been written, the output stream is flushed. The output stream remains open after this method returns.

参数：
out - an output stream.
comments - a description of the property list.
抛出：
java.io.IOException - if writing this property list to the specified output stream throws an IOException.
java.lang.NullPointerException - if out is null.
自从：
1.2
